abstract: BlackBerry executive chairman John S Chen calls for patience as company reports $28 million profit in fourth quarter; revenue dropped to $660 million, down from $793 million.
lead_paragraph: The smartphone maker is in the midst of a major restructuring, limiting production of phones to avoid the financial drains of the past.

headline.main: BlackBerry Reports $28 Million Profit in 4th Quarter
headline.print_headline: BlackBerry Posts Unexpected $28 Million Profit in 4th Quarter

snippet: The smartphone maker is in the midst of a major restructuring, limiting production of phones to avoid the financial drains of the past.
